description: Max Avila has an atomic-level sex drive. Sometimes he gives in and submits to a rough top that wants to turn this punk into a bitch. There’s a rough side to his inner top, though, and he never passes up the opportunity to fuck a bottom hard and raw, and that’s Benjamin Gomez this time around. But to say Max is rough is an understatement -- he mounts Benjamin and hammers his hole like it’s personal sex toy!
title: TRAILER: Max Avila Rails Benjamin Gomez
